original_title: Scruff en el sueño de una noche de verano
overview: A love story based on William Shakespeare's classic "The Dream of a Summer Night." Our beloved dog Scruff is determined to keep his beautiful bride Pedigrí is matched by an obligation, with a Great Dane. So he decided to escape and hide in the forest trying to avoid the union ... but unfortunately will be enchanted by a magical flower that appears only during the longest night of the year, the San Juan night.
title: Scruff en el sueño de una noche de verano
